thread.title: Radio SERT

author: Radio SERT
title: Radio SERT
text: I have been running a vps there since 2013. I have not had too much problem with them. Most downtimes i faced were planned. Only unexpected thing I remember was a problematic customer who was sucking the common server resources with bitcoin related activities. But the support team was very helpful and solution finder and changed my node. Now everything is going well.
